results.title: Les Darcy
results.creator_credit: Pamela Vanneck, Ron Saunders, Kevin Dobson and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Willesee’s Australians”.
Australian boxing hero, Les Darcy, was a legend in his lifetime. In a short but glorious career, Darcy fought fifty fights and won forty-six, and was the Australian Heavyweight Champion in 1916 - he was never knocked out. After fleeing to America to avoid Army enlistment, he became ill and died at the age of 21.

results.title: Jamaica Inn
results.brief_description: Maureen O’Hara is a beautiful damsel in distress who must contend with the madness of the evil Squire Pengallon, the chief of a band of cut throats who lures ships onto the rocks in Victorian times. The opening of the film sets the tone: a “Jamaica Inn” sign half in gloom buffeted by wind and rain. Charles Laughton is memorable as the evil Squire. Rated: PG

results.title: The Lady vanishes
results.brief_description: The plot centres around a British group, en route to England by train from Switzerland. When a dear old lady disappears, a young woman seeks the aid of a fellow passenger to turn sleuth in an attempt to locate her. Something is amiss. Not all the travellers are who they appear to be. Cast: Michael Redgrave, Margaret Lockwood, Dame May Whitty, Paul Lukas, Cecil Parker.

results.title: Lifeboat
results.brief_description: A small band of men and women survive the sinking of an Allied freighter by a German U-boat, only to find themselves dependent upon a Nazi they rescue from the sea into their lifeboat. With the help of a John Steinbeck script and bravura performances from a cast that includes Tallulah Bankhead, Walter Slezak and Hume Cronyn, Hitchcock transforms the cramped confines of the lifeboat into a bigger-than-life battlefield of good and evil. “Lifeboat” is a tour de force only the Master of Suspense - Alfred Hitchcock could have created.

results.title: Throne of blood
results.creator_credit: Akira Kurosawa, Shojiro Motoki and Toho Kabushiki Kaisha
results.brief_description: Taketoki Washizu is a general serving-hand and Tsuzuki, the master of Cobweb Castle. Prompted by his wife, Washizu murders Tsuzuki and takes command of Cobweb Castle. He is killed in battle when the son of a rival warlord, one of his victims, attacks the castle. Kurosawa’s visually atmospheric version of Shakespeare’s “Macbeth” stars Toshiro Mifune.

results.title: Les Miserables
results.creator_credit: Richard Boleslawski, Darryl F. Zanuck and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Victor Hugo’s classic story of an escaped convict, Jean Valjean (Frederic March) and the detective, Inspector Javert (Charles Laughton) who trails him for a lifetime. A remarkably exciting and moving film. Co-starring Cedric Hardwicke.

results.title: Cyrano de Bergerac
results.creator_credit: Michael Gordon, Stanley Kramer and Stanley Kramer Films
results.brief_description: Based on Edmond Rostand’s classic play this film version has Jose Ferrer in an Academy Award winning performance as the long nosed Cyrano. Famous for his skill with words Cyrano mocks pompous noblemen, protects the poor and displays unmatched bravery but he nurses a secret love for his beautiful cousin Roxanne, who is also loved by a handsome but inarticulate soldier, who seeks Cyrano’s help in wooing her. Also stars Mala Powers and William Prince.

results.title: Orpheus
results.brief_description: A compelling cinematic allegory of the haunting legend of Eurydice and Orpheus set in modern times, with poet Marais encountering The Princess of Death. Orpheus was allowed to reclaim his dead lover on the condition he did not look back upon her face. But he does … An unforgettable experience of true love, with beautiful music and poetic cinematic effects. Rated: M

results.title: A Taxing woman
results.creator_credit: Juzo Itami, Seigo Hosogoe and Yasushi Tamaoki
results.brief_description: Evading taxes is a popular pastime in “The Land of the Rising Yen”, especially among the predatory real estate tycoons who, in collusion with politicians, gangsters and large “straight” business combines, have made Japan’s land prices the highest in the world. To combat this pandemic “lawlessness” there is a national tax police, who, with their almost storm trooper tactics, make America’s much maligned IRS inspectors seem almost helpful. In Japanese with English subtitles.

results.title: Undercover
results.creator_credit: David Stevens, David Elfick, Filmco and Palm Beach Pictures
results.brief_description: Join in the singing, the flag-waving, the dancing, the scandal and the fights that made the roaring twenties such an exciting and memorable time for Australia. Undercover catches the glitter and madness of those times and follows one typical Australian whose imagination, drive and energy turned his impossible dream into reality. Stars Genevieve Picot.
